settings.title: Settings
settings.promptGenerationDescription: Select the language and other preferences to optimize prompt creation for AI platforms.
settings.hideGenerateButtonDescription: Turn on or off the Taoprompt interface for prompt creation on AI chatbot platforms like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and more.

setup.thankYou: Thank you for downloading the Taoprompt Extension! We're excited to have you onboard and hope it helps improve your workflow.

no-prompt: You do not have any prompts yet

personal-library.security-alert-description: Your prompts are stored locally on your device for security. We don't share or upload this data anywhere.

model-warning: This model is only available for premium plans
